name: Rishi Krishna

top_projects.name: DialDeck
top_projects.description: Dialഡെക്ക് transforms your nostalgic BSNL landline into a cutting-edge stream deck, powered by an Arduino Nano.

top_projects.name: housekeeping_management
top_projects.description: Guest Review Management (Earlier known as housekeeping Management)

top_projects.name: youtube_downloader
top_projects.description: YouTube Audio and Video Downloader! This Python script allows you to download audio and video files from YouTube using their video URLs

Rishi-k-s/DialDeck.summary: Recent activities include establishing a simple Bluetooth connection, making multiple key touches, and completing the first version of the code for ESP 32. Additionally, a pull request was merged to add a new feature.

Rishi-k-s/youtube_downloader.summary: New updates have been added, including a pull request that was merged to incorporate new features and enhancements to the YouTube downloader application.

Rishi-k-s/rpicam-apps.summary: Recent updates include post-processing fixes for Hailo Boards, specifically addressing changes to .hef file names for yolov6 and yolox, ensuring compatibility with the latest Hailo Boards.

raspberrypi/rpicam-apps.summary: A pull request has been submitted to correct file name inconsistencies in the repository, specifically addressing the renaming of .hef files for yolov6 and yolox, which caused errors when running examples from the Raspberry PI AI Kit site.

profile_summary:
Rishi Krishna is a highly skilled and innovative developer with a strong foundation in programming languages such as C++, Rust, and Python. With a growing professional network of 21 followers, Rishi has established himself as a credible and reliable presence in the development community. His impressive portfolio of 58 public repositories showcases his active involvement in various projects, demonstrating his ability to design, develop, and deploy high-quality solutions. As a student, Rishi has already made a significant impact in the field, leveraging his technical expertise to drive innovation and growth.

Rishi's technical expertise and achievements have positioned him as a rising star in the development community. With a solid understanding of computer science fundamentals and a passion for learning, he continues to expand his skill set and stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends. Rishi's commitment to excellence and his unique value proposition make him an attractive collaborator for businesses and individuals seeking to leverage cutting-edge technologies to drive success. As a dedicated and results-driven developer, Rishi is well-equipped to deliver high-performance solutions that meet the evolving needs of the tech industry, and his ongoing contributions to the open-source community are a testament to his dedication and expertise.
